description.description: the description which you wish to categorize (max 4000 chars)

action.description: learn - will create or update a rule, remove - will remove a previous created rule. Note: category is required when action is learn

additional.description: additional information (recommended to use in concatenation with original description, if present)

categorization.description: the type of categorization applied. Possible values: none, personal, business. Default: personal

category.description: the new category code for the description, used with action: learn

country_code.description: the code of the country, present in Salt Edge API

currency_code.description: the code of the currency, present in Salt Edge API

identifier.description: a unique identifier of the transaction object (max 255 chars).

mode.description: possible values are: normal, fee, transfer

original_category.description: the original category of the transaction

original_subcategory.description: the original subcategory of the transaction

tags.description: the original tags of the transaction
